dmca.title: Written notification of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: ms65442@gmail.com [mailto:ms65442@gmail.com] 
Sent: Saturday, April 21, 2007 12:46 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: RE: Written notification of Copyright Infringement

This written communication is directed to:

Andrea Z. Almeida

Designated Agent for Claims of Copyright Infringement for "The Planet"

Sent via email to copyright@theplanet.com
<mailto:copyright@theplanet.com>

AND via facsimile to: 214-782-7756

(as provided in the Copyright Infringement Procedure)

RE: Written notification of Copyright Infringement

Dear Ms. Almeida:

My name is Michelle MacPhearson and I own and maintain exclusive rights 
to badderadder.com, the product contained therein (Badder Adder), and 
the exclusive rights to any and all content written or otherwise, 
salespages, customer testimonials and other information contained at 
badderadder.com and all pages therein.

The link to my salespage is: 
http://www.badderadder.com/2006/04/20/add-thousands-of-myspace-friends-a
nd-automatically-send-messages-comments-and-bulletins/ 
<https://www.revolutiontilt.com:2096/horde/services/go.php?url=http%3A%2
F%2Fwww.badderadder.com%2F2006%2F04%2F20%2Fadd-thousands-of-myspace-frie
nds-a>

My copyright notice can be found here: 
http://www.badderadder.com/copyright-notice/

Legaladder.com <../../../../Local%20Settings/Temp/legaladder.com>, which

"The Planet" is hosting, has stolen my material, including my salespage,

my customer testimonials, and my written content including this
statement:

" My name is *Michelle MacPhearson* and I have made a recent discovery 
that can help you to quickly and easily add thousands of friends to your

MySpace profile, send Messages, post Comments and Bulletins, and blast 
out your Event invitations - *all like clockwork*! Whether you are:"

*the above paragraph can be found near the bottom of their salespage at 
legaladder.com <../../../../Local%20Settings/Temp/legaladder.com>

THEY EVEN FORGOT TO TAKE MY NAME OUT OF THE STOLEN MATERIAL so they are 
either falsely representing themselves to be me or when pasting the 
stolen, infringed upon copyrighted material, they simply forgot to take 
my name out.

On their salespage, at legaladder.com, you will also note the following 
material stolen from me in which they simply removed the name "Badder 
Adder" (my product) and replaced it with the name "Legal Adder":

***begin copy and paste***

Before Legal Adder, I was struggling to market my music with about 600 
friends. Now, I just hit the 10,000 friends mark in about 30 days!

Due to this increased exposure, my internet record sales of my album 
have increased and I am inspired to prosper as an independent artist!

Thank you, Legal Adder! You are a godsend!

Jitu tha Jugganot, Universal Zulu Nation

www.cdbaby.com/jituthajugganot <http://www.cdbaby.com/jituthajugganot>

        

Legal Adder is awesome, it has made it possible for me to make hundreds 
of dollars a day on Myspace.

But it is not only helping ME make money. I have created a guide to 
making money on my space called TheMySpaceBank showing others how to do 
the same, and none of this would be possible without The Legal Adder.

Hundreds of dollars a day is life changing, and helping other people do 
the same feels great! Thank you so much Legal Adder!

Greg Morrison

*D**ear MySpace User,*

Would you like to: (Check any of the following boxes that apply)

        

*Add hundreds or even _thousands_* of friends to your MySpace profile?

        

Tap into the _exponentially_ growing database of prospects on MySpace to

*promote your product, service, business or music*?

        

*Start your own circle or network of friends*, prospects, members or 
even fans and build your very own personal /mass media/?

        

*Promote your band* to the Internet's *largest* haven for musicians and 
song lovers?

        

And *_achieve all of the above with "hands free" automation_*?

If your answer is *YES* to any one or more of the statements above, then

*you owe it to yourself to read _every line_ of this letter*.

My name is *Michelle MacPhearson* and I have made a recent discovery 
that can help you to quickly and easily add thousands of friends to your

MySpace profile, send Messages, post Comments and Bulletins, and blast 
out your Event invitations - *all like clockwork*!

Whether you are:

    * *Promoting your band* to millions of music lovers,
    * Scouting for *enthusiasts who share the same passion* and
interests,
    * *Finding ways to promote your business *on a network of 120
      million users,
    * Or *looking to make new friends* with the world,

With *Legal Adder's cutting edge features *not only will you be able to 
*add thousands of MySpace friends per day*, you will also be able to 
communicate with your network of friends via sending messages, comments,

event invitations and bulletins - _on sheer autopilot_!

*Designed for Microsoft Windows (r) XP, 2000, 98, ME*

Amazing software! I have tried most of the friend management programs on

the net. Legal Adder is by far the best. It's fast, reliable, does what 
it says and they keep it up to date. You will not find more marketing 
ability for the money. It has been so productive I own two copies and 
keep 2 computers busy nearly 24/7. Buy Legal Adder... you will love what

it does for your Myspace promotions.

Jason Miller

InstantGrillz.Net <http://www.InstantGrillz.Net>

Since we got Legal Adder people all over the world have come to enjoy 
our page and listen to our music we have really made a lot more positive

moves. Thanks.

Miles of 20 Miles

*Click Here To Order Legal Adder Now! 
<http://www.legaladder.com/LegalSetup.exe>*

Thank you Legal Adder, you have an outsranding program, so easy to use 
and effective. We use it to promote our music, videos, post comments, 
send friend request, our numbers are growing each day thanks to your 
product. We created a 911 video tribute video, we used some of my 
personal footage, thanks to Legal Adder we got a few thousand hits on
it.

Legal Adder does all the work, just a few clicks and you can see the 
program work, I downloaded the video and I was like I have to get it, 
they also let you sample the program before you purchase it, once I 
tried it I was sold, Ijust had to have it, and its the best tool for our

promoting on Myspace.

Cas 1 Nite Life Entertainment

I don't know if I can type a testimonial without sounding like I was 
paid to do so. Legal Adder is AMAZING!

I was producing a music festival and after setting up the profile page 
on Myspace had to set up the arduous task of adding people after having 
done it several times over for other retreat profiles, my personal 
profile, my business profile, etc. etc. I couldn't add one more person 
manually and set out to find something that could help. Enter Legal
Adder.

LegalAdder is absolutely amazing. I was only looking for something that 
would help add friends. BA also sends comments, bulletins and notes. 
Plus the "chaining" feature is very helpful and the fact that you can 
send reqeusts and a note together...Brilliant!

Thank you, Michelle, thank you, thank you, thank you. Another promoter 
friend of mine has also purchased BA and she's as satisfied as I am.

Marquita Thomas

Superb program, well written, well presented and well crafted. Updates 
whenever MySpace changes its code and new features are added often, all 
included in the initial price! *The best piece of software I purchased 
in 2006.*

Nate

***end of copy and paste***

You will see they have stolen my entire salespage and my customer 
testimonials. You will also note MY NAME, again, in the customer 
testimonial written by "Marquita Thomas" above.

Legaladder.com, anyone affiliated with that site, its products or its 
materials, nor anyone else, has my permission to use my product or my 
content, written or otherwise, (specified above) in any manner.

I am exercising a good faith belief that use of the material in the 
manner complained of is not authorized by me, Michelle MacPhearson, (the

owner of Badder Adder and all content at badderadder.com), any of my 
agents, or the law; and, I affirm the information provided you in this 
notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, I am authorized 
to act because I am the owner of the product Badder Adder and maintain 
exclusive ownership and rights to the product and any and all content, 
written or otherwise, contained at badderadder.com and its related 
websites and pages.

I trust you will "expeditiously remove or disable access to the 
material" as set forth in the Copyright Infringement Procedure. I am 
offended that someone has stolen and is using and benefiting from, 
monetarily and otherwise, my product, my name and my content and 
information and anticipate your prompt response to the matter.

Sincerely,

//s//

Michelle A. MacPhearson

ms65442@gmail.com <mailto:mam@michellemacphearson.com>

530-333-0875

4481 Slodusty Road

Garden Valley, CA 95633
